name: Weekend At Stacy's
description:
Weekend at Stacy's is a horror game, kinda inspired by the game "mortuary assistant", but it became what it became in the end.

𝐈𝐧𝐟𝐨

We made this game for a schoolproject, and it is far from a finished game, but playable enough that some might think it's fun. 

Use A Headset For Best Possible Experience!

Controls

"WASD" to Move Character

"Space" to Jump

"C" to Crouch

"E" to Pick Up Items

"Left Mouse Button" to Take Item Out Of Bag

"Right Mouse Button" to Set item Back In Bag

Credits

Unity and Programming: Just Burger 'N Stuff, (some other people Including Nikolai the Goat with the Szechuan sauce)

art:  Dream and St0rk_dk((1) st0rk_dk - Twitch)

voice for Stacy: Oppressed_Ego

Idea: Ebbe gaming and this yt vid 

Bugs

- there is one bug where you can't pick up items from the bag when you are on the kid. it only happens sometimes, but when it does the game is unable to be finished, just go out and touch some grass instead when this happens.

( i propably won't touch this game again, so don't get mad if you ask me to change something and the game still haven't changed in 10 years)
